actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Dr. Jose Souto Cabral, his wife Leodea and their eight children, Leoniti, Lucia, Lillian, Jose, Guaracy, Fernando, Leodina, and Eurico.

summary.text: Provides for the relief of Dr. Jose Souto Cabral, his wife Leodea and their eight children, Leoniti, Lucia, Lillian, Jose, Guaracy, Fernando, Leodina, and Eurico.
